summary: The diff implements all three requirements (REQ-43, REQ-44, REQ-45) with good coverage. Backend adds adminCredentials stable state with default credentials and both verifyAdminCredentials/setAdminCredentials functions. Frontend replaces the passcode gate with a username+password form, adds sessionStorage persistence, shows credentials on HomePage, and adds a ChangeAdminCredentialsForm. All major acceptance criteria appear to be satisfied based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: A backend/migration.mo module was added to handle migration of existing stable state to include the new adminCredentials field.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not request a migration module or any migration strategy. It only required stable state initialization with default credentials on first deploy.

hallucinated_features.description: Password visibility toggle (show/hide password) buttons are added to both the login form and the ChangeAdminCredentialsForm.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not mention any show/hide password toggle UI feature; it only required the fields to exist.
